text: Chuathbaluk Airport is a state-owned public-use airport located one nautical mile (1.85 km) northeast of the central business district of Chuathbaluk, a city in the Bethel Census Area of the U.S. state of Alaska. == Facilities == Chuathbaluk Airport covers an area of at an elevation of 243 feet (74 m) above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 9/27 with a gravel surface measuring 3,401 by 60 feet (1,037 x 18 m). ==Airlines and destinations== Prior to its bankruptcy and cessation of all operations, Ravn Alaska served the airport from multiple locations. ===Statistics=== {| class="wikitable" |+ Top domestic destinations: January – December 2015 ! title: Chuathbaluk Airport
